newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT - United News rated "hold".
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - United News rated "hold".

text.p: United News & Media Plc was rated "hold" as Salomon Brothers began coverage of the stock, a research note from analysts at the brokerage said on Monday.

After a strong performance since the MAI merger, Salomon said the stock was fully valued on fundamentals and that the core media business was on a 22 percent premium to the rest of the UK market on the basis of its forecast 1997 earnings.
It noted that Carlton Communications Plc and Mirror Group Plc, both rated "buy," offer comparable business exposure with stronger and more profitable television and newspaper brands.
United News was down 6-1/2p at 658-1/2, Cartlon was up 1/2p at 481-1/2 and Mirror was up 2p at 221.
